message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $11,000. Can you consider it?
I understand your position, Bob, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. Could you consider my original counteroffer of $11,000 or meet me at $11,500?
